TopicTitle: You know you play too much KSP when....

Articles.Content:
• You try to rotate your view of a webpage by right-clicking and dragging it.
  • Your screenshot folder is bigger than your KSP folder.
  • You haven't had breakfast yet today.
  • You go to a restaurant for dinner and spend your time waiting calculating delta v on a napkin.
  • You still don't trust mechjeb for a landing, but you let him ascend for you unattended while you make lunch despite the fact he always does backflips for no reason.
There is a thread in existence for this already.

There is a thread in existence for this already.

it wouldn't be a game forum if there wasn't, but I couldn't find it, so...

it wouldn't be a game forum if there wasn't, but I couldn't find it, so...

I hope you are not serious since it's on the same page, scroll down and it's the last topic on this page.

But for convenience here is a link

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29988-The-You-know-you-play-too-much-KSP-when-thread
It has actually been on the front page every day since it was started almost 4 weeks ago.
